info.longDescription:
Located in the heart of Istanbul's historic peninsul
Grand Ünal Hotel offers an unforgettable accommodation experience by combining modern comfort with historical richness. Situated in Yenikapı, our hotel features 86 rooms and is within walking distance of the city's most significant tourist attractions.
Central Location
Grand Ünal Hotel is ideally located for those wishing to explore Istanbul's historical and cultural treasures. From our hotel, you can easily walk to iconic landmarks such as the Sultanahmet Mosque, Hagia Sophia, Grand Bazaar, and Basilica Cistern. Additionally, our hotel is within walking distance of the metro, providing convenient access to the city.

Modern Comfort
Our hotel has been designed with your comfort in mind. Our modern and elegantly decorated rooms are equipped with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, flat-screen TVs, and minibars. With 24-hour room service and daily housekeeping, your comfort and satisfaction are our top priorities.

Close to Shopping Centers
Grand Ünal Hotel is also ideal for shopping enthusiasts. Our hotel is very close to the city's most popular shopping centers and stores, making it easy for our guests to meet their needs.

Unforgettable Experiences
Whether you are in Istanbul for business or leisure, Grand Ünal Hotel offers you a peaceful, comfortable, and enjoyable stay. With the enchanting view of the Marmara Sea, you can experience the city's historical texture and modern life together.

We look forward to welcoming you to Grand Ünal Hotel.
